main event: An old very large object was sighted in the sky in Arcadia, Missouri on November 12, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as bright white with a reddish tint.,It emitted no sound and left no trail or exhaust.,The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes.,The observation was made visually from the ground.,No photographs were included with the record.
sighted object: a very large bright white object with reddish tint
